name: My Fitness Coach: Dance Workout
overview: 14 different choreographed dance routines using popular Latin dance styles such as Salsa, Samba, Rumba, Flamenco, Reggaeton and Meringue. 9 different choreographed dance routines featuring boxing moves. 8 Fun mini games targeting specific muscles: Rodeo, Karate, Sword Fighting, Marathon/Jogging, Jump Rope, Canoe, Boxing, Bull Dodging. A Personal Coach gives you personalised advice on your performance: Your coach motivates you and increases the intensity of your workout based on your performance. Your Coach follows your fitness calendar, calories burned and BMI. A multiplayer mode to enjoy your workouts with a friend!
